Your Audit Request Is In!

I'll email you within 24 hours to introduce myself and get the ball rolling.

Here's What Happens Next

1

I email you within 24 hours

I'll introduce myself and explain exactly what access I need to audit your setup.

2

You grant me access

Read-only access to your ad accounts, GA4, GTM, and any relevant tracking tools. Takes about 5 minutes — I'll walk you through it.

3

I audit everything

Tags, pixels, GA4 configuration, conversion mapping, CRM attribution — the full stack. I dig into every layer.

4

You get a Loom video

A recorded walkthrough showing exactly what's broken, why it matters, and a priority-ranked fix list.

5

We hop on a call (optional)

If you want to discuss the findings live, we can. No pressure, no pitch unless you want one.

About Access

I'll need read-only access to your ad accounts, GA4, GTM, and any relevant tracking tools to complete the audit. Don't worry — I'll send you step-by-step instructions. Most people have it set up in under 5 minutes.

Questions in the meantime? Email me at luc@lucflynn.com
